Longtooth Shifting.name: Longtooth Shifting
Longtooth Shifting.flavor: You unleash the beast within and take on a savage countenance.
Longtooth Shifting.effect:
Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls. In addition, while you are bloodied, you gain regeneration 2.
Level 11: Regeneration 4.
Level 21: Regeneration 6.
